p: In the simulation study we also vary time scales by fixing the average infectivity rate μ λ = 1 and gradually increasing the average length of infectious period γ −1 from 1.5 to 3, corresponding to the basic reproduction number R 0 increased from 1.5 to 3. As before the simulation began with one infection and was stopped when there were 100 diagnosed individuals. The results are summarized in S2 and S3 Figs.
